text: Pacific Sunwear of California, LLC, commonly known as PacSun, is an American retail clothing brand. The company sells lifestyle clothing along with swim, footwear and accessories designed for teens and young adults. The company has 325 stores in all 50 states and Puerto Rico. PacSun is headquartered in Anaheim, California. The company went bankrupt in April 2016 and is now owned by Golden Gate Capital. ==References== Category:1980 establishments in California Category:American clothing companies Category:Companies based in California
title: PacSun
